description: Source code for a Pinia store managing restaurant menu items in an admin interface, including state management, getters, and actions for fetching, adding, editing, and toggling availability of menu items.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches menu items for a specific restaurant and updates the store state.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new menu item with optimistic UI update and handles rollback on failure.

methods.name: editItem
methods.description: Edits an existing menu item with optimistic update and rollback on failure.

methods.name: toggleAvailability
methods.description: Toggles the availability status of a menu item with optimistic update and rollback.
